thread.title: ODELL, J.

author: ODELL, J.
title: ODELL, J.
text: Excellent company. Purchased a Gaggia Classic and Gaggia MDF grinder from these folks and the order was promptly shipped. Upon arrival to my house, I opened the box to find everything packed with care and still intact. Everything has operated as expected and I am glad I bought from these folks. I would definitely buy from them again. They had the best deal I could find and their review videos were one of the main reasons I bought from them. The videos offer excellent feedback as well as home repair/upgrades help for the do-it-yourselfer like me.
